ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
let sleep = Packages.java.lang.Thread.sleep;
let tim = Math.floor(Math.random()*401);
sleep(600-tim);
if (baseUrl.match(/http/)){
chapter=baseUrl;
}else{
chapter=java.hexDecodeToString(result)
}
result=java.get(chapter,{	'user-agent': ui}).body();
cache.put('chapterurl', result);
result;
</js>

ruleToc.nextTocUrl:
<js>
result=cache.get('chapterurl');
mool=java.getString('#pagestats@html',result)
mls=mool.match(/kbd\>\/(.*?)\</)[1]||1;
nid=java.get('nid');
url=`{{getUrl()}}book/${nid}_`
var data = [];
for (let i = 2; i <= mls; i++) {
    data.push(url + i + '.html');
}
data;
</js>
